analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0x11779b17fd98baee555c0d712d5b4014a8ff3497.sol:
	Contract LineageCode has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0x11779b17fd98baee555c0d712d5b4014a8ff3497.sol#313-315)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
